The 'Audi A3' is a small family car produced by the German automaker Audi since
1996. The first two generations of A3 were based on the Volkswagen Group A
platform, which they share with several other models such as the Audi TT,
Volkswagen Golf, Volkswagen Caddy and Volkswagen Touran as well as SEAT LeÃ³n,
SEAT Toledo and Å koda Octavia. The third-generation A3 uses the Volkswagen Group
MQB platform.
